page.title: 03Industrial Llanelli.
page.content: There are many unemployed people in our block since the Steel Works,Tin Plate and Copper Works closed down.The Borough Council try and attract new industries into the area through the establishment of industrial parks and estates.These are usually sited on land once used by the heavy industries of Llanelli.The Council has had some success with their schemes,and are attracting such firms as clothing manufacturers,plastics processing and small engineering units, Employment in the block for women workers is mainly as shop assistants,or in the various Civic Offices and with Banks,Building Societies and Solicitors.There is also some employment for women in the light industries.Employment for men is on similar lines with the addition of the railway and buses.
